name: Snailiens
summary: Introducing Snailiens! The adorably terrifying monsters aimed at stealing all of Earth’s cabbages. In this VR tower defense game, you play as the commander of the S.A.L.T. defense network. In virtual reality you construct towers, equip guns, and fight off the Snailien invaders.  If you protect your cabbages the government will provide additional funding for your S.A.L.T defense system and you will be tasked to build new and improved sodium based armaments to push off the encroaching Snailien forces.
